== Kaiparamba (CT) (627829) ==

Kaiparamba (CT) is a town in the [[Thrissur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 4.73 sq. km. and harbouring 1700 households with total population of 7179 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 8 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 310 km. Male population is 3514 and female population is 3665. Scheduled Caste population is 607 and Scheduled Tribes population is 11. Census Location Code of the town is 627829<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (population_total 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 8 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 90 km. Railway station is at Thrissur at a distance of 8 km.
